text: Neophrissoma umbrinum is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by White in 1858, originally under the genus Phrissoma. It is known from South Africa.BioLib.cz - Neophrissoma umbrinum. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. ==References== Category:Phrissomini Category:Beetles described in 1858
title: Neophrissoma umbrinum
